data.quote: Some people are so busy learning the tricks of the trade that they never learn the trade.
data.author: Vernon Law

data.quote: I've worked very hard at understanding myself, learning to be assertive. I'm past the point where I worry about people liking me.
data.author: Pam Dawber

data.quote: Just learning to think in another language allows you to see your own culture in a better viewpoint.
data.author: Gates McFadden

data.quote: I look back at the looks I've had over the years. I'm proud of myself that I had the courage to experiment with crazy hairstyles and some fashion things. Would I do it again? No. But that's part of the learning process and getting from point A to point B.
data.author: Christina Aguilera

data.quote: My favorite place is whichever sidewalk is beneath my feet because I am just constantly fascinated by walking and looking and learning. If I've already walked a street five times, then the next five times I walk it looking up, and I learn something about the cornices.
data.author: Danny Meyer

data.quote: The French word for wanderlust or wandering is 'errance.' The etymology is the same as 'error.' So to wander is to make mistakes. In other words, to make mistakes, to make errors is sort of the idea of learning through trial and error, allowing the mistakes to be part of the process.
data.author: Robyn Davidson

data.quote: There are no mistakes. The events we bring upon ourselves, no matter how unpleasant, are necessary in order to learn what we need to learn; whatever steps we take, they're necessary to reach the places we've chosen to go.
data.author: Richard Bach

data.quote: The hardest of all is learning to be a well of affection, and not a fountain; to show them we love them not when we feel like it, but when they do.
data.author: Nan Fairbrother

data.quote: We now accept the fact that learning is a lifelong process of keeping abreast of change. And the most pressing task is to teach people how to learn.
data.author: Peter Drucker

data.quote: You teach best what you most need to learn.
data.author: Richard Bach

data.quote: Without pain, there would be no suffering, without suffering we would never learn from our mistakes. To make it right, pain and suffering is the key to all windows, without it, there is no way of life.
data.author: Angelina Jolie

data.quote: Because in the school of the Spirit man learns wisdom through humility, knowledge by forgetting, how to speak by silence, how to live by dying.
data.author: Johannes Tauler

data.quote: You're never too old to start learning, and you're never too young to aim high and achieve great things.
data.author: Asa Hutchinson

data.quote: The real test of a musician is live performance. It's one thing to spend a long time learning how to play well in the studio, but to do it in front of people is what keeps me coming back to touring.
data.author: Neil Peart

data.quote: I did stand-up comedy for 18 years. Ten of those years were spent learning, four years were spent refining, and four years were spent in wild success. I was seeking comic originality, and fame fell on me as a byproduct. The course was more plodding than heroic.
data.author: Steve Martin

data.quote: As long as you live, keep learning how to live.
data.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

data.quote: My goal in the classroom was always to make sure they were having so much fun that they didn't realize they were learning.
data.author: Rick Riordan

data.quote: Learning how to operate a soul figures to take time.
data.author: Timothy Leary

data.quote: Learning is finding out what you already know.
data.author: Richard Bach

data.quote: People need to be made more aware of the need to work at learning how to live because life is so quick and sometimes it goes away too quickly.
data.author: Andy Warhol

data.quote: It is not hard for me to remember when I was in college. I loved many things about college life: I loved learning. I loved the comradery. And I loved football.
data.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

data.quote: The next Bill Gates will not start an operating system. The next Larry Page won't start a search engine. The next Mark Zuckerberg won't start a social network company. If you are copying these people, you are not learning from them.
data.author: Peter Thiel

data.quote: The purpose of learning is growth, and our minds, unlike our bodies, can continue growing as we continue to live.
data.author: Mortimer Adler

data.quote: This life is a process of learning.
data.author: Lauryn Hill

data.quote: It is only when we forget all our learning that we begin to know.
data.author: Henry David Thoreau

data.quote: Desperation is a necessary ingredient to learning anything, or creating anything. Period. If you ain't desperate at some point, you ain't interesting.
data.author: Jim Carrey

data.quote: Strange as it may seem, no amount of learning can cure stupidity, and formal education positively fortifies it.
data.author: Stephen Vizinczey

data.quote: I started practicing yoga. I started learning some hands-on healing stuff. And I found really good chiropractors, really good massage therapists, and what I found is I've been able to actually peel off layers of trauma on my body and actually move better now than I did.
data.author: Ricky Williams

data.quote: Recipes tell you nothing. Learning techniques is the key.
data.author: Tom Colicchio

data.quote: By discovering how our minds work, we can improve our learning power and unlock our true potential.
data.author: Robert Winston

data.quote: Gardening is learning, learning, learning. That's the fun of them. You're always learning.
data.author: Helen Mirren

data.quote: By 2025, we can expect the world to be completely digital. Paper books will be a thing of the past. Education will be delivered through analytics-based assessment tools and adaptive learning platforms.
data.author: Osman Rashid

data.quote: I think you never stop learning.
data.author: Norman Foster

data.quote: Waiting is a period of learning. The longer we wait, the more we hear about him for whom we are waiting.
data.author: Henri Nouwen

data.quote: Singing into a microphone and learning to play an instrument - learning to do your craft - that's the most important thing! It's not about what goes on in a computer!
data.author: Dave Grohl

data.quote: Learning from the past helps to ensure that mistakes are not repeated.
data.author: Monica Johnson

data.quote: As I enter a new phase of life and my circle broadens, I start learning new things.
data.author: Kapil Dev

data.quote: Getting bogged down in old stories stops the flow of learning by censoring our perceptions, making us functionally deaf and blind to new information. Once the replay button gets pushed, we no longer form new ideas or conclusions - the old ones are so cozy.
data.author: Martha Beck

data.quote: That's the beauty of the acting world. You can play so many different characters who know and do so many things that you have no idea about as yourself. So I'm a big fan of workshops and classes and learning new things because you can always apply it. It's your little supply bag of creativity. Keep filling it up.
data.author: Daniela Ruah

data.quote: Before and after emancipation, the Negro, in self-defense, was propelled toward the white employer. The endowments of wealthy white men have developed great institutions of learning for the Negro, but the freedom of action on the part of these same universities has been curtailed in proportion as they are indebted to white philanthropies.
data.author: W. E. B. Du Bois

data.quote: Learning to distinguish the illegal immigrant from the legal immigrant does not solve the problem of illegal immigration.
data.author: Jan C. Ting

data.quote: Whatever the medium, there is the difficulty, challenge, fascination and often productive clumsiness of learning a new method: the wonderful puzzles and problems of translating with new materials.
data.author: Helen Frankenthaler

data.quote: Every picture has been a learning opportunity for me.
data.author: Sam Raimi
